1072:2: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
1072:4: yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam ,
1072:5: nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante |
1072:14: iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādāna skandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate |
1072:15: etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate,
1072:19: yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā,
1072:26: ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate |
1072:27: nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti,
1072:29: na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam,
1072:31: ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate | yathoktam -
1072:32: ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi (ve?)
1072:34: akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca ||
1072:40: yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate,
1072:44: samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate |
1072:47: duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate |
1072:52: asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti |
1072:53: tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate ||1||
1072:55: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca |
1072:57: caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaprasaṅge sati yadetadanityādibhirākārairduḥkhasatyaparijñānaṃ duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya ca sākṣikarma sākṣātkaraṇam,
1072:62: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ ||3||
1072:63: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ |
1072:65: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati |
1072:70: iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate |
1072:71: tadyathā - saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam |
1072:72: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti |
1072:73: tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭha kleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam |
1072:74: teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam |
1072:75: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tadarhatphalam |
1072:82: yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti,
1072:83: tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni |
1072:84: caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi |
1072:85: ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante ||
1072:86: iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ,
1072:89: tadyathā - kāmāvacaraduḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasatkāyāntagrāhamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyadaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
1072:90: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
1072:91: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārga lakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ |
1072:94: evaṃ kāmāvacarasamudayadarśanaprahātavyamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ hetu samudayaprabhavapratyayākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñāna kṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
1072:95: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ |
1072:96: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ samudayasatyā kārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ |
1072:100: evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodha darśanaprahātavyasamudayoktasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ nirodhaśāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
1072:101: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
1072:102: etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodha satyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇa stṛtīyaḥ |
1072:103: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ |
1072:105: evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgadarśanaprahātavyanirodhoktānuśayeṣu śīlavrataparāmarśamaṣṭamaṃ prakṣipya aṣṭānuśayapratipakṣaḥ mārganyāyapratiopannairyāṇikākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgā lambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
1072:106: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimukti mārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
1072:109: evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate |
1072:110: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate ||
1072:111: ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante |
1072:112: yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ |
1072:116: ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti |
1072:117: ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante,
1072:120: ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārtha mānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa |
1072:125: tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate |
1072:129: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate |
1072:138: catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti |
1072:144: sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam ||
1072:147: yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni,
1072:148: tadā satyadarśanabhāvanā labhyānāṃ phalānāmabhāvāt pratipannakaphalasthapudgalānāmabhāva eva |
1072:150: tatra adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt |
1072:152: āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo'pi na saṃbhavati |
1072:160: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati ||
1072:162: tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt |
1072:164: tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamāna śaeraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet ||
1072:167: avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam |
1072:168: tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati |
1072:169: saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ |
1072:171: tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti |
1072:173: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati |iti |
1072:174: madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate |
1072:175: tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat | tad -
1072:177: śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase ||5||
1072:184: tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena iṣṭāniṣṭaphalena na saṃbhavataḥ |
1072:185: sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ - kuru ,
1072:190: āgaccha ityevamādayo'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti |
1072:192: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam |
1072:193: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase ||7||
1072:194: sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya “ yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ“ ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo'smāsu mahāntaṃ khedamāpanno'tīva vihanyate vividhairbhūtaiḥ parikalpairhanyate ityarthaḥ |
1072:195: na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ,
1072:205: bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti ||
1072:210: ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān |
1072:229: ata ācāryaḥ karuṇayā parasya mithyāpravacanārthāva bodhanirāsārthaṃ bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavyavasthāmeva tāvadadhikṛtyāha -
1072:232: iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate |
1072:235: skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ |
1072:236: iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate |
1072:243: kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti?
1072:253: na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti | tatra hi -
1072:256: iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya ?
1072:257: sa hi paramārtho'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ |
1072:268: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane ||9||
1072:269: atrāha - yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu,
1072:277: anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha -
1072:281: tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati,
1072:284: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā ||19||
1072:285: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati |
1072:286: kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate |
1072:287: pratibimbākārāyāśca lokasaṃvṛterabādhanāt karmakarmaphaladharmā dharmādikamapi na bādhate |
1072:290: yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati,
1072:291: sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed,
1072:294: ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet |
1072:296: yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet,
1072:301: tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa āpadyate - kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti?
1072:303: ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt |
1072:307: evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati |
1072:311: tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati ||
1072:312: nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya kalpate,
1072:314: evameva maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi ] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt,
1072:317: yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti,
1072:319: evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa madhyamayā pratipadā grahītāraṃ parameṇa jātijarāmaraṇādiduḥkhahutāśanaśamanaikarasena nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇajaladharadhārāvarṣamukhena yojayati |
1072:320: yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati ||
1072:325: yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati,
1072:326: ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam,
1072:327: saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ |
1072:329: atha bhagavato'cirābhisaṃbuddhasyaitadabhavat - adhigato mayā dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso'tarko'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ |
1072:341: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
1072:342: ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ,
1072:345: ato yaṃ bhavān doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti,
1072:347: abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā |
1072:352: api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha -
1072:353: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate |
1072:354: sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate ||14||
1072:358: yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe -
1072:370: yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam |
1072:372: sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate |
1072:373: tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate |
1072:378: āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo'pi yujyate |
1072:379: sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho'pi yujyate |
1072:382: dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante | tadevam -
1072:383: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate |
1072:387: yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate,
1072:392: atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan -
1072:404: yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi,
1072:405: tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi ||16||
1072:407: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām |
1072:408: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase ||17||
1072:411: tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt |
1072:416: iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarva metat kāryādikaṃ pratibādhase |
1072:417: tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate ||17||
1072:431: tathā āryalaṅkāvatāre - “ svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ“ ||
1072:440: saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate |
1072:444: ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpatti lakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat,
1072:477: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate ||21||
1072:483: anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā - yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti |
1072:485: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham |
1072:489: evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate |
1072:490: na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate,
1072:491: sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha -
1072:494: iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate |
1072:495: tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanā vaiyarthyameva,
1072:496: ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo'pi bhavato na yujyate ||22||
1072:497: svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha -
1072:498: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate |
1072:502: evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase ||23||
1072:503: idānīmāryamārgo'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha -
1072:505: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate ||24||
1072:507: tadā mārgo'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti |
1072:510: atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā,
1072:511: evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt,
1072:513: api ca - duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate |
1072:515: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate |
1072:521: idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati,
1072:525: yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate,
1072:534: tadā pūrvamaparijñāta svabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti |
1072:539: yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam,
1072:540: te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi |
1072:542: samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate |
1072:544: na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca -
1072:546: yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam,
1072:547: evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati |
1072:550: na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante,
1072:551: kiṃ tarhi adhigamo'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha -
1072:556: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ |
1072:557: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ ||29||
1072:559: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati ||30||
1072:562: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate |
1072:563: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate ||31||
1072:564: yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt,
1072:566: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
1072:573: iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt,
1072:576: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati |
1072:577: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi ||33||
1072:578: sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate |
1072:582: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate |
1072:583: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate ||34||
1072:587: yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti,
1072:588: tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati |
1072:590: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate | iti |
1072:593: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam |
1072:599: api ca | sarva eva hyete ' gaccha,
1072:606: tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha -
1072:614: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ,
1072:616: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt |
1072:625: [ vicitrābhiravasthāmiḥ svabhāvaracitaṃ svabhāvenaiva racitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagat svabhāva śūnyavādinām |
1072:627: tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyā vartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt |
1072:631: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam |
1072:632: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve |
1072:633: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ || iti ||
1072:639: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
1072:644: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt,
1072:646: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt |
1072:647: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt |
1072:648: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt ||39||
1072:649: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ -
1072:651: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca ||40||
1072:652: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati,
1072:653: sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ |
1072:665: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ sattvā evabhimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
1072:666: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti?
1072:667: bhagavānāha - ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
1072:669: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
1072:671: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate,
1072:674: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā |
1072:678: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ śīlavān,
1072:694: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ |
1072:698: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate |
1072:706: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate |
1072:707: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate |
1072:708: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate |
1072:715: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau |
1072:718: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati ||
1072:719: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri ārya satyāni draṣṭavyāni?
1072:729: sa na kalpayati - ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ,
1072:738: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet |
1072:739: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca |
1072:742: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam ||
1072:743: evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu |
1072:745: tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā |
1072:746: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
1072:749: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kkaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati |
